column1: As  such,  I  conclude,  that  this  is  not  an  appropriate  case  in  which  to
interfere  with  the  findings  of  the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  of  Negombo
dated 30/03/2016. Hence, I dismiss the Appeal.
The Registrar is directed to send a copy of this judgment to the High Court
of Negombo along with the original case record.
